name: Deathtroopers: The Outpost
summary: The story is very simple, but it connects directly with the original: a fleeing soldier ends up crashing into Endor. Here he will find death and a deadly virus, already widespread throughout much of the Outer Rim of the known galaxy. Seeking help, he finds an old resistance outpost, seemingly abandoned. In an attempt to find a means of communication to call for help, he enlists the help of his faithful but damaged droid DD5. Having learned of the events that are happening on the planets around his own, he decides to embark on a fight for survival without any other choice.
